English: Allows this unit to run over Worms, Mindfraggers, and Myrmidons
Launch a missile at a target location
Once per turn, take a free move after killing an enemy
Action Point costs for firing Weapons are reduced by 1 while a passenger is inside
Exiting the vehicle costs 3 Action Points
The vehicle explodes upon death, causing significant damage to nearby targets
Passengers Restore 80HP and 5WP at the start of each turn
All enemy units within 12 tiles become DISORIENTED, preventing the use of Will Point abilities
All allies within 5 tiles recover 2 Action Points
Removes all Paralysis, Bleeding, Poison, Strained, Infected, Dazed and Slowed status effects from all allied units within 10 tiles
Restore 10 armor to all allied units within 10 tiles
Disappear from view for the next turn (or until spotted)
Until the end of the turn, exiting the vehicle does not cost any Action Points
Entering the vehicle does not cost any Action Points
Grants +10 Armor and +100 HitPoints to all wheels
Grants a secondary firemode specialised in single-target takedown
Load Incendiary Grenades that deal 40 additional Fire Damage
Load Concussion Grenades that deal 30 additional Sonic Damage
